name: Phoenix Feather Quill
description: Writes in flames. Requires fireproof parchment for use.

name: Enchanted Sandglass
description: Pauses time for 30 seconds when flipped. Single use.

name: Crystal Orb of Truth
description: Reveals secrets. May also reveal more than you want to know.

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: Turns the user invisible for 10 minutes. Warning: Clothes not included.

name: Dragon Scale Shield
description: Forged from ancient dragon scales. Virtually indestructible.

name: Boots of Swiftness
description: Increases running speed by 50%. Perfect for outrunning trolls.

name: Ring of Whispering Winds
description: Allows the wearer to hear whispers carried by the wind. Limited range.

name: Cloak of Shadows
description: Renders the user almost invisible in dim light. Not effective in sunlight.
